name: Basic Contour Mill
description: Standard contour milling operation for external profiles
gcode:
; CAD/CAM SYSTEM - Generated Mill G-code with AI assistance
; Operation: contour
; Material: aluminum
; Tool: endmill Ø6mm
; Date: 2023-09-15

G90 ; Absolute positioning
G21 ; Metric units
G17 ; XY plane selection
M3 S10000 ; Start spindle
M8 ; Coolant on
G0 Z10 ; Move to safe height

; Z Level: -1
G0 X-50 Y-25 ; Move to start position
G1 Z-1 F300 ; Plunge to cutting depth
G1 X50 Y-25 F800 ; Corner 1
G1 X50 Y25 F800 ; Corner 2
G1 X-50 Y25 F800 ; Corner 3
G1 X-50 Y-25 F800 ; Corner 4

; Z Level: -2
G0 Z5 ; Move to safe height
G0 X-50 Y-25 ; Move to start position
G1 Z-2 F300 ; Plunge to cutting depth
G1 X50 Y-25 F800 ; Corner 1
G1 X50 Y25 F800 ; Corner 2
G1 X-50 Y25 F800 ; Corner 3
G1 X-50 Y-25 F800 ; Corner 4

; Z Level: -3
G0 Z5 ; Move to safe height
G0 X-50 Y-25 ; Move to start position
G1 Z--3 F300 ; Plunge to cutting depth
G1 X50 Y-25 F800 ; Corner 1
G1 X50 Y25 F800 ; Corner 2
G1 X-50 Y25 F800 ; Corner 3
G1 X-50 Y-25 F800 ; Corner 4

; Z Level: -4
G0 Z5 ; Move to safe height
G0 X-50 Y-25 ; Move to start position
G1 Z-4 F300 ; Plunge to cutting depth
G1 X50 Y-25 F800 ; Corner 1
G1 X50 Y25 F800 ; Corner 2
G1 X-50 Y25 F800 ; Corner 3
G1 X-50 Y-25 F800 ; Corner 4

; Z Level: -5
G0 Z5 ; Move to safe height
G0 X-50 Y-25 ; Move to start position
G1 Z-5 F300 ; Plunge to cutting depth
G1 X50 Y-25 F800 ; Corner 1
G1 X50 Y25 F800 ; Corner 2
G1 X-50 Y25 F800 ; Corner 3
G1 X-50 Y-25 F800 ; Corner 4

; End of program
G0 Z30 ; Move to safe height
M9 ; Coolant off
M5 ; Stop spindle
M30 ; Program end

name: Basic Pocket Mill
description: Standard pocket milling operation for internal features
gcode:
; CAD/CAM SYSTEM - Generated Mill G-code with AI assistance
; Operation: pocket
; Material: aluminum
; Tool: endmill Ø6mm
; Date: 2023-09-15

G90 ; Absolute positioning
G21 ; Metric units
G17 ; XY plane selection
M3 S10000 ; Start spindle
M8 ; Coolant on
G0 Z10 ; Move to safe height

; Z Level: -2
G0 X0 Y0 ; Move to center
G1 Z-2 F250 ; Plunge to cutting depth
G1 X18 Y0 F600 ; Step 1 corner 1
G1 X18 Y18 F600 ; Step 1 corner 2
G1 X-18 Y18 F600 ; Step 1 corner 3
G1 X-18 Y-18 F600 ; Step 1 corner 4
G1 X18 Y-18 F600 ; Step 1 corner 1
G1 X18 Y0 F600 ; Step 1 close loop

; Z Level: -4
G0 X0 Y0 ; Move to center
G1 Z-4 F250 ; Plunge to cutting depth
G1 X18 Y0 F600 ; Step 1 corner 1
G1 X18 Y18 F600 ; Step 1 corner 2
G1 X-18 Y18 F600 ; Step 1 corner 3
G1 X-18 Y-18 F600 ; Step 1 corner 4
G1 X18 Y-18 F600 ; Step 1 corner 1
G1 X18 Y0 F600 ; Step 1 close loop

; Z Level: -6
G0 X0 Y0 ; Move to center
G1 Z-6 F250 ; Plunge to cutting depth
G1 X18 Y0 F600 ; Step 1 corner 1
G1 X18 Y18 F600 ; Step 1 corner 2
G1 X-18 Y18 F600 ; Step 1 corner 3
G1 X-18 Y-18 F600 ; Step 1 corner 4
G1 X18 Y-18 F600 ; Step 1 corner 1
G1 X18 Y0 F600 ; Step 1 close loop

; Z Level: -8
G0 X0 Y0 ; Move to center
G1 Z-8 F250 ; Plunge to cutting depth
G1 X18 Y0 F600 ; Step 1 corner 1
G1 X18 Y18 F600 ; Step 1 corner 2
G1 X-18 Y18 F600 ; Step 1 corner 3
G1 X-18 Y-18 F600 ; Step 1 corner 4
G1 X18 Y-18 F600 ; Step 1 corner 1
G1 X18 Y0 F600 ; Step 1 close loop

; End of program
G0 Z30 ; Move to safe height
M9 ; Coolant off
M5 ; Stop spindle
M30 ; Program end

name: Basic Drilling Pattern
description: Standard drilling operation for hole patterns
gcode:
; CAD/CAM SYSTEM - Generated Mill G-code with AI assistance
; Operation: drill
; Material: steel
; Tool: drill Ø8mm
; Date: 2023-09-15

G90 ; Absolute positioning
G21 ; Metric units
G17 ; XY plane selection
M3 S800 ; Start spindle
M8 ; Coolant on
G0 Z10 ; Move to safe height

; Drilling operations
G0 X-30 Y-30 ; Move to first hole position
G1 Z-15 F80 ; Drill hole
G0 Z10 ; Retract to safe height

G0 X0 Y-30 ; Move to second hole position
G1 Z-15 F80 ; Drill hole
G0 Z10 ; Retract to safe height

G0 X30 Y-30 ; Move to third hole position
G1 Z-15 F80 ; Drill hole
G0 Z10 ; Retract to safe height

G0 X-30 Y0 ; Move to fourth hole position
G1 Z-15 F80 ; Drill hole
G0 Z10 ; Retract to safe height

G0 X0 Y0 ; Move to fifth hole position
G1 Z-15 F80 ; Drill hole
G0 Z10 ; Retract to safe height

G0 X30 Y0 ; Move to sixth hole position
G1 Z-15 F80 ; Drill hole
G0 Z10 ; Retract to safe height

G0 X-30 Y30 ; Move to seventh hole position
G1 Z-15 F80 ; Drill hole
G0 Z10 ; Retract to safe height

G0 X0 Y30 ; Move to eighth hole position
G1 Z-15 F80 ; Drill hole
G0 Z10 ; Retract to safe height

G0 X30 Y30 ; Move to ninth hole position
G1 Z-15 F80 ; Drill hole
G0 Z10 ; Retract to safe height

; End of program
G0 Z30 ; Move to safe height
M9 ; Coolant off
M5 ; Stop spindle
M30 ; Program end

name: Advanced 3D Profile
description: Advanced 3D profile milling with varying depth
gcode:
; CAD/CAM SYSTEM - Generated Mill G-code with AI assistance
; Operation: profile (3D)
; Material: aluminum
; Tool: ballnose Ø6mm
; Date: 2023-09-15

G90 ; Absolute positioning
G21 ; Metric units
G17 ; XY plane selection
M3 S12000 ; Start spindle
M8 ; Coolant on
G0 Z10 ; Move to safe height

; High Speed Machining mode enabled
G64 P0.01 ; Path blending with tolerance of 0.01mm

; Z Level: -0.5
G0 X-40 Y-25 Z5 ; Move above start position
G1 Z-0.5 F200 ; Plunge to cutting depth
G1 X40 Y-25 F500 ; Move along bottom edge
G1 X40 Y25 F500 ; Move along right edge
G1 X-40 Y25 F500 ; Move along top edge
G1 X-40 Y-25 F500 ; Move along left edge

; Z Level: -1.0
G0 Z5 ; Move to safe height
G0 X-40 Y-25 ; Move to start position
G1 Z-1.0 F200 ; Plunge to cutting depth
G1 X40 Y-25 F500 ; Move along bottom edge
G1 X40 Y25 F500 ; Move along right edge
G1 X-40 Y25 F500 ; Move along top edge
G1 X-40 Y-25 F500 ; Move along left edge

; Many more Z levels omitted for brevity

; Z Level: -10.0
G0 Z5 ; Move to safe height
G0 X-40 Y-25 ; Move to start position
G1 Z-10.0 F200 ; Plunge to cutting depth
G1 X40 Y-25 F500 ; Move along bottom edge
G1 X40 Y25 F500 ; Move along right edge
G1 X-40 Y25 F500 ; Move along top edge
G1 X-40 Y-25 F500 ; Move along left edge

; Finishing pass
; Finishing allowance: 0.1mm
; Contour finishing strategy
G0 Z5 ; Move to safe height for finishing pass
G0 X-40 Y-25 ; Move to start position
G1 Z-10.0 F200 ; Plunge to full depth
G1 X40 Y-25 F400 ; Slower feed for finishing
G1 X40 Y25 F400 ; Continue contour
G1 X-40 Y25 F400 ; Continue contour
G1 X-40 Y-25 F400 ; Complete contour

; End of program
G0 Z30 ; Move to safe height
M9 ; Coolant off
M5 ; Stop spindle
M30 ; Program end

name: Basic Turning Operation
description: Standard external turning operation for cylindrical parts
gcode:
; CAD/CAM SYSTEM - Generated Lathe G-code with AI assistance
; Operation: turning
; Material: steel
; Tool: turning
; Stock: Ø50mm x 100mm
; Date: 2023-09-15

G90 ; Absolute positioning
G21 ; Metric units
G18 ; XZ plane selection (standard for lathes)
M3 S1000 ; Start spindle clockwise
M8 ; Coolant on

; Turning operation
G0 X52 Z2 ; Position tool
G0 Z0 ; Move to face

; First pass (depth 0.5mm)
G0 X49 ; Rapid to diameter
G1 X48 F0.1 ; Plunge to depth
G1 Z-80 F0.2 ; Turn along Z
G0 X52 ; Retract
G0 Z0 ; Return to face

; Second pass (depth 1.0mm)
G0 X47 ; Rapid to diameter
G1 X46 F0.1 ; Plunge to depth
G1 Z-80 F0.2 ; Turn along Z
G0 X52 ; Retract
G0 Z0 ; Return to face

; Third pass (depth 1.5mm)
G0 X45 ; Rapid to diameter
G1 X44 F0.1 ; Plunge to depth
G1 Z-80 F0.2 ; Turn along Z
G0 X52 ; Retract
G0 Z0 ; Return to face

; Fourth pass (depth 2.0mm)
G0 X43 ; Rapid to diameter
G1 X42 F0.1 ; Plunge to depth
G1 Z-80 F0.2 ; Turn along Z
G0 X52 ; Retract
G0 Z0 ; Return to face

; End of program
G0 X100 Z100 ; Retract to safe position
M9 ; Coolant off
M5 ; Stop spindle
M30 ; Program end

name: Standard 3D Print
description: Standard 3D printing operation for basic parts
gcode:
; Generated 3D Printer G-code with AI assistance
; Operation: standard
; Material: PLA
; Nozzle: 0.4mm
; Layer Height: 0.2mm
; Date: 2023-09-15

M82 ; Set extruder to absolute mode
G21 ; Set units to millimeters
G90 ; Use absolute coordinates
M104 S200 ; Set extruder temperature
M140 S60 ; Set bed temperature
M109 S200 ; Wait for extruder temperature
M190 S60 ; Wait for bed temperature
G28 ; Home all axes
G1 Z5 F5000 ; Move Z up a bit
G1 X0 Y0 Z0.3 F3000 ; Move to start position
G1 E5 F1800 ; Prime the extruder
G92 E0 ; Reset extruder position

; Layer 1, Z=0.2
G1 Z0.2 F3000 ; Move to new layer
G1 F60 ; Set print speed
G1 X-25 Y-25 E0.5 ; Move to start position
G1 X25 Y-25 E4.5 ; Draw line
G1 X25 Y25 E8.5 ; Draw line
G1 X-25 Y25 E12.5 ; Draw line
G1 X-25 Y-25 E16.5 ; Draw line
G92 E0 ; Reset extruder position

; Layer 2, Z=0.4
G1 Z0.4 F3000 ; Move to new layer
G1 X-25 Y-25 E0.1 ; Move to start position
G1 X25 Y-25 E4.1 ; Draw line
G1 X25 Y25 E8.1 ; Draw line
G1 X-25 Y25 E12.1 ; Draw line
G1 X-25 Y-25 E16.1 ; Draw line
G92 E0 ; Reset extruder position

; Many more layers omitted for brevity

; Layer 100, Z=20.0
G1 Z20.0 F3000 ; Move to new layer
G1 X-25 Y-25 E0.1 ; Move to start position
G1 X25 Y-25 E4.1 ; Draw line
G1 X25 Y25 E8.1 ; Draw line
G1 X-25 Y25 E12.1 ; Draw line
G1 X-25 Y-25 E16.1 ; Draw line
G92 E0 ; Reset extruder position

; End of print
G1 E-2 F1800 ; Retract filament
G1 Z25 F3000 ; Move Z up
G1 X0 Y200 F3000 ; Move to front
M104 S0 ; Turn off extruder
M140 S0 ; Turn off bed
M84 ; Disable motors

name: Educational Example - Spiral
description: Educational example showing a spiral toolpath, good for teaching CNC concepts
gcode:
; CAD/CAM SYSTEM - Generated Mill G-code Educational Example
; Operation: spiral contour
; Material: aluminum
; Tool: endmill Ø6mm
; Date: 2023-09-15

G90 ; Absolute positioning
G21 ; Metric units
G17 ; XY plane selection
M3 S8000 ; Start spindle
M8 ; Coolant on
G0 Z10 ; Move to safe height

; Educational spiral toolpath
G0 X0 Y0 ; Move to center
G1 Z-2 F200 ; Plunge to initial depth

; Spiral path - incrementally increasing radius
G1 X2 Y0 F600
G2 I-2 J0 X0 Y2
G2 I0 J-2 X-2 Y0
G2 I2 J0 X0 Y-2
G2 I0 J2 X2 Y0

G1 X4 Y0
G2 I-4 J0 X0 Y4
G2 I0 J-4 X-4 Y0
G2 I4 J0 X0 Y-4
G2 I0 J4 X4 Y0

G1 X6 Y0
G2 I-6 J0 X0 Y6
G2 I0 J-6 X-6 Y0
G2 I6 J0 X0 Y-6
G2 I0 J6 X6 Y0

G1 X8 Y0
G2 I-8 J0 X0 Y8
G2 I0 J-8 X-8 Y0
G2 I8 J0 X0 Y-8
G2 I0 J8 X8 Y0

G1 X10 Y0
G2 I-10 J0 X0 Y10
G2 I0 J-10 X-10 Y0
G2 I10 J0 X0 Y-10
G2 I0 J10 X10 Y0

G1 X12 Y0
G2 I-12 J0 X0 Y12
G2 I0 J-12 X-12 Y0
G2 I12 J0 X0 Y-12
G2 I0 J12 X12 Y0

G1 X14 Y0
G2 I-14 J0 X0 Y14
G2 I0 J-14 X-14 Y0
G2 I14 J0 X0 Y-14
G2 I0 J14 X14 Y0

G1 X16 Y0
G2 I-16 J0 X0 Y16
G2 I0 J-16 X-16 Y0
G2 I16 J0 X0 Y-16
G2 I0 J16 X16 Y0

G1 X18 Y0
G2 I-18 J0 X0 Y18
G2 I0 J-18 X-18 Y0
G2 I18 J0 X0 Y-18
G2 I0 J18 X18 Y0

G1 X20 Y0
G2 I-20 J0 X0 Y20
G2 I0 J-20 X-20 Y0
G2 I20 J0 X0 Y-20
G2 I0 J20 X20 Y0

; Second depth level
G1 Z-4 F200 ; Plunge to next depth

; Repeat spiral path at new depth
G1 X2 Y0 F600
G2 I-2 J0 X0 Y2
G2 I0 J-2 X-2 Y0
G2 I2 J0 X0 Y-2
G2 I0 J2 X2 Y0

; Further repeats omitted for brevity

; End of program
G0 Z30 ; Move to safe height
M9 ; Coolant off
M5 ; Stop spindle
M30 ; Program end

name: Manufacturing Fixture
description: Machining operation for creating a fixture plate with multiple features
gcode:
; CAD/CAM SYSTEM - Generated Mill G-code for Manufacturing Fixture
; Operation: profile
; Material: aluminum
; Tool: endmill Ø10mm
; Date: 2023-09-15

G90 ; Absolute positioning
G21 ; Metric units
G17 ; XY plane selection
M3 S8000 ; Start spindle
M8 ; Coolant on
G0 Z10 ; Move to safe height

; Tool compensation enabled
G41 D1 ; Tool compensation
G0 X-50 Y-50 ; Approach point for compensation

; Z Level: -3
G0 X-55 Y-55 ; Position tool
G1 Z-3 F300 ; Plunge to cutting depth
G1 X55 Y-55 F1000 ; Move along bottom edge
G1 X55 Y55 F1000 ; Move along right edge
G1 X-55 Y55 F1000 ; Move along top edge
G1 X-55 Y-55 F1000 ; Move along left edge

; Z Level: -6
G0 Z5 ; Move to safe height
G0 X-55 Y-55 ; Position tool
G1 Z-6 F300 ; Plunge to cutting depth
G1 X55 Y-55 F1000 ; Move along bottom edge
G1 X55 Y55 F1000 ; Move along right edge
G1 X-55 Y55 F1000 ; Move along top edge
G1 X-55 Y-55 F1000 ; Move along left edge

; Z Level: -9
G0 Z5 ; Move to safe height
G0 X-55 Y-55 ; Position tool
G1 Z-9 F300 ; Plunge to cutting depth
G1 X55 Y-55 F1000 ; Move along bottom edge
G1 X55 Y55 F1000 ; Move along right edge
G1 X-55 Y55 F1000 ; Move along top edge
G1 X-55 Y-55 F1000 ; Move along left edge

; Z Level: -12
G0 Z5 ; Move to safe height
G0 X-55 Y-55 ; Position tool
G1 Z-12 F300 ; Plunge to cutting depth
G1 X55 Y-55 F1000 ; Move along bottom edge
G1 X55 Y55 F1000 ; Move along right edge
G1 X-55 Y55 F1000 ; Move along top edge
G1 X-55 Y-55 F1000 ; Move along left edge

; Drill mounting holes
G0 Z10 ; Move to safe height
G0 X-40 Y-40 ; Move to first hole position
G81 X-40 Y-40 Z-12 R2 F300 ; Drilling cycle
G0 X-40 Y40 ; Move to second hole position
G81 X-40 Y40 Z-12 R2 F300 ; Drilling cycle
G0 X40 Y40 ; Move to third hole position
G81 X40 Y40 Z-12 R2 F300 ; Drilling cycle
G0 X40 Y-40 ; Move to fourth hole position
G81 X40 Y-40 Z-12 R2 F300 ; Drilling cycle
G80 ; Cancel fixed cycle

G40 ; Cancel tool compensation

; End of program
G0 Z30 ; Move to safe height
M9 ; Coolant off
M5 ; Stop spindle
M30 ; Program end
